claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok contains recombinant Ha proteins of the three strains of influenza virus specified by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok contains the hemagglutinin proteins from the three strains specified by health authorities (such as WHO and FDA), supporting the claim that it ensures an identical antigenic match with the selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote indicates that Flublok is manufactured to meet the official standards set by the USPHS, which are based on the strains selected by WHO and FDA, supporting the claim of an identical antigenic match.
